channel.title: Girls on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in Girls on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: tnight
item.description: i met a bunch of cool cats.. and then I hung with a bunch of cool cats. it was a good evening. last night I went to bed at 8:45-9ish and slept until 12. it was incredible. serious as sugar.my face is healing nicely.. i am missing the keyboard a lot. my typeing has gone downhill..i want to date pretty girls..
